headline: Builders FirstSource to Host Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Financial Results Conference Call and Webcast
summary: IRVING, Texas, January 16, 2026--Builders FirstSource, Inc. (NYSE: BLDR) ("Builders FirstSource" or the "Company") will host a conference call and webcast on Tuesday, February 17, 2026, to discuss the Company’s financial results and other business matters. The teleconference will begin at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time and will be hosted by Peter Jackson, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Pete Beckmann, Chief Financial Officer.
